data.title: Climate & Weather Averages in Salamanca, Salamanca, Spain

data.text:
Currently: 28 °C. Passing clouds. (Weather station: Salamanca / Matacan, Spain). See more current weather

Annual Weather Averages Near Salamanca

Averages are for Salamanca / Matacan, which is 14 kilometers from Salamanca.

Based on weather reports collected during 1992–2021.
